title: Poster Typeface 30s / 50s ?
content:
I've seen this [type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045725/http:/bp2.blogger.com/_rXrYjmmvkhk/SHeuK_4qlNI/AAAAAAAABpU/EPOl4Sfsry0/s1600-h/Carlos+D%27Eschevannes.+Un+mec+du+milieu.+Editions+Prima.jpg) a thousand times, especially on french posters and bookcovers. I think it might also be used a lot during the Dada movement, but I might be totally wrong :) Especially the M looks very familiar …

Does anyone has an idea?
author: piero101

comments.content:
This would have been hand-lettered. Not sure if there's a typeface based on this style or even what this style is called.

- Lex
